projects.Name: Airbnb Project
projects.Description: The Airbnb Project is a service designed for travelers who want to find affordable accommodation options. It offers a selection of six popular cities for travelers to explore and provides real-time accommodation offers. Users can access detailed information about various accommodations, view them on a map, and use a user-friendly interface to make informed choices.choice.
projects.Tech: Restful API ,Auth, CRUD, LocalStorage, Reactjs (redux--toolkit, react-router-dom, aos...)

projects.Name: Restaurant
projects.Description: The Restaurant Project is a fully responsive website for a restaurant. It features an elegant design and a user-friendly interface, and it is optimized for mobile devices. It provides customers with an accessible and enjoyable way to explore the restaurant's offerings.
projects.Tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, CSS Animation, Responsive

projects.Name: SAMAR
